first_translate: the training grounds of the royal palace...
hgh...!
what’s wrong?
where did your confidence go?!
huh?
uh... huh?
hmph.
is this all you’ve got?
I can’t believe these guys call themselves guards for the crown prince.
it looks more like they’re the ones being protected instead.
hrng...!
to think we were defeated by some brat...!!!
doesn’t he ever get tired?!

hangle: 사생아 주제에, 겨우 스무 살 먹은 애송이 주제에.
first_translate: and on top of everything else, he's only twenty years old!

hangle: 다들 날 보고 그런 생각이나 했겠지.
first_translate: that must have been what everyone was thinking about me.

hangle: 역시 대련 핑계로 서열 정리를 하길 잘했군.
first_translate: good thing I decided to establish my authority through sparring.
he’s such a monster...!!!
your highness.
you have a visitor.
a visitor?

hangle: 훈련 중에 방해받는 건 좋아하지 않으니,
first_translate: I don’t want anyone interrupting our training session,
so tell them to come back another time.
yes--

hangle: 그럼 피오나 헤일론 영애께는 돌아가시라고 전하겠습니다.
first_translate: then shall I send away miss fiona haylor as well?
no.
forget it.
I’ll see her now.

hangle: 땀과 먼지를 뒤집어쓰고 피오나 영애를 만나러 갈 순 없으니,
first_translate: but since I’m drenched in sweat and dust right now,
get ready to wash up quickly.

hangle: 그동안 피오나 영애가 지루하지 않도록 정중히 대접하고.
first_translate: while I do so, make sure she is treated kindly while waiting.
as for you men, run fifty laps around the training field.
all of you.
pardon?!
exactly who is this fiona haylor girl...
...that makes him act like this?!
I didn’t expect fiona would visit first.
siegren, did you know...

hangle: 내가 누구라고 소문이 났는 지 알고 있었어?
first_translate: ...people had already started calling me “the winter guardian”?
they said something along those lines!
winter guardian?

hangle: 헤일론에서 널 그렇게 부르는 놈들이 있기는 했지.
first_translate: there were people from house haylor who called you that before.
really?!
yeah.

hangle: 넌 주위를 신경 쓰는 성격이 아니라 몰랐겠지만.
first_translate: though you probably wouldn’t notice because you never pay attention to things like that.
this feels kind of embarrassing.
there’s no need to feel embarrassed.
after all, you earned yourself that title.
when you say it like that, it gets even worse.

hangle: 그나저나 시그렌이 구박받고 있을까 봐 걱정했는데…
first_translate: anyway, I was worried sieg might be getting bullied here,
but thankfully, that doesn’t seem to be happening.
even the maids appear to adore him.
aww...
cute...
listen.

hangle: 나, 상대한테 겨울의 수호자라고 불렸을 때 조금 설렜다?
first_translate: I felt a little flutter when someone referred to me as the winter guardian earlier.
just like that maid over there.
who exactly told you that?
be polite, your highness.
why does it matter?

hangle: 널 설레게 했으니 친구로서 감사 인사라도 하러 가야지.
first_translate: if they made you blush, then I’d like to thank them personally.
how strange.

hangle: 나한테 그 말을 해준 사람은 리비아 영애야.
first_translate: lady livia was the one who complimented me.
do you know her?
livia?
I could swear she belongs to house priscilla...
wait a minute.
she’s a woman.
you never mentioned blushing after hearing compliments from a man.
maybe I won’t be thanking whoever it was anytime soon.
I suddenly feel better.
I don’t really understand why,
but if sieg likes her, then that’s good enough for me.
why are you looking at me like that?
like how?
I don’t know either.
fiona.
I heard you plan on winning the hunting competition.
that’s correct.
looks like you've also received news about it too.

hangle: 아벨, 이 아니라 스승님이 말해 주던데.
first_translate: not directly from abel though. his master told us.

hangle: 사실 나도 그 사냥대회에 나가는 데 말이야.
first_translate: in fact, I'll be participating in the tournament myself.
really?!
then we’re rivals!
rivals?
me against you...

hangle: 솔직히 황태자나 다른 기사들은 이길 수 있을 거라 생각하는데,
first_translate: 085onestly, I thought I'd win easily against the other knights or even the crown prince himself,
but I hadn’t considered competing against you.

hangle: 난 네가 참가하지 말라고 하면 안 할 건데.
first_translate: if you ask me not to participate, I won’t.
huh?
wh-why...?
well...

hangle: 이 정도는 사교계에서 다들 하는 건데,
first_translate: everyone in high society participates in events like this anyway.
on top of that, I’m supposed to help you rather than compete against you.
with sieg fighting alongside me, we will destroy the competition...!!
oh, stop it!
stop talking nonsense.

hangle: 너도 황자가 되고 첫 사냥 대회잖아.
first_translate: this is going to be your very first hunt as the new crown prince.

hangle: 네 실력을 보여 줄 좋은 기회를 쉽게 날릴 수는 없지!
first_translate: we can’t let slip such a great opportunity to show off your skills!
plus, if there happens to be any ladies you fancy,

hangle: 대회에서 멋진 모습을 보여줄 수도 있고!
first_translate: now’s your chance to impress them during the event!
I guess I’m just babbling due to embarrassment...

hangle: 이 사냥 대회는 사실 원작에서도 있었던 이벤트로,
first_translate: the hunting competition actually took place in the original novel as well.

hangle: 소설 속 시그렌은 대회에서 우승하여 유니스에게 마물을 바쳤었다.
first_translate: novel-sieg participated in the contest and presented eunice with the beast he hunted down.

hangle: 그리고 이것은 단순히 마물을 잡는걸 넘어서
first_translate: besides simply catching monsters,
this event has become romanticized among young nobles!

hangle: 마물을 잡아 흠모하는 상대나 연인에게 사냥감을 바치기!라 대대로 인기가 좋다.
first_translate: it became popular across generations where participants present their prey to their crushes or lovers!
many couples ended up marrying each other thanks to this tradition!
“ladies you fancy,” huh?
of course, that’s part of the reason.
th-there is?!

hangle: 내가 모르는 사이 유니스와 만난 걸까?
first_translate: has he met eunice without telling me?
goo--
yes.
quit making weird assumptions.
